content: *a great christmas holiday decoration or tree ornament lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70708ad skill level easy level 2 1 ball each a 620-129 wool-ease yarn cocoa b 620-301 wool-ease yarn white/multi crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm small amounts of red purple green and gold yarn fiberfill stuffing special stitch decrease single_crochet decrease some construction required to finish see also 70709ad amigurumi gingerbread person 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/amigurumi-gingerbread-person
